alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 02 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Michigan, including the following county, Oakland. * WHEN...Until 930 PM EDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 756 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain fell due to thunderstorms, with upwards of 2 to 3 inches in some locations. This will lead to some minor flooding, particularly in urban and poor drainage areas. - Additional rainfall amounts of up to one half inch will be possible over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pontiac, Milford, Wolverine Lake, Keego Harbor, Sylvan Lake, Commerce, White Lake, Waterford, Orchard Lake and Bloomfield Township. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
